summary: Changes the Stormcloaks\' armor to that of their ancient ancestors.
descriptionHtml:
This mod was done at the request of WarlordThorvald. In short, what this mod does is it changes the Stormcloak armor to Ancient Nord (Draugr) armor. Nothing fancy, just an .esp, thought I\'d put it up if anyone else likes the idea of Stormcloaks kicking imp ass in ancient nordic style.

Installation is simple, place the .esp into your data folder and activate it.
Uninstallation is just as simple, just delete the .esp and/or deactivate it.
author: BlinkRiddle
